fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Initiate someone into your secret society each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All players you have initiated into your society will receive an extra night chat that you may not access.
- Once four other people have been initiated into your society, all four players and yourself will commit suicide dealing an Unstoppable attack. This will happen the night after you have recruited the fourth member. Dead members will not count towards this objective.
- All players in your secret society will gain Basic defense.
- If you die before you have met your win condition, all players in your secret society will leave the society.
- You may not initiate yourself into your own secret society.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Recruit four people into your secret society.
